do: Ensure all text has adequate contrast (Gray 900 for heads, Gray 600 for body).
Make the site 'Text-First' - imagery should support, not dominate.
dont: Do NOT use gradients on text.
Do NOT use heavy drop shadows (keep it flat/subtle).
Do NOT use 'lorem ipsum' - write realistic copy about AI/Investing.
Do NOT use center alignment for long paragraphs.

implementation_steps: 2. Configure tailwind.config.js with the custom colors (#F5F5F7, #1D4ED8, etc.).
3. Build the 'Hero' component with the profile image and value prop.
4. Build the 'BentoGrid' component for displaying insights.
7. Create 'AI Insights' and 'Investing Insights' pages reusing the grid.
8. Ensure mobile responsiveness (stack grids to cols-1).
